ALERT_THRESHOLD

Absolute Address:
Base Offset:
0xa0
Size:
0x4

Contents

Bits Identifier Access Reset Decoded Name
[31:16] ALERT_THRESHOLD_INV rw 0xfffd -
[15:0] ALERT_THRESHOLD rw 0x2 -

Field Descriptions

ALERT_THRESHOLD_INV

This should be set to the value above, but inverted.

ALERT_THRESHOLD

This is the threshold size that will signal an alert when value is reached. A value of zero will disable alerts. The default value is 2.
